document.full_text: gunmen in plain clothes opened fire repeatedly on protesters in yemen's southern city of taiz on saturday, wounding 35 people, a doctor said, and a gulf envoy arrived to try to revive a plan to end the crisis.
document.title: gunmen fire on protesters in yemen, wounding 35
lines_and_colors: gunmen in plain clothes opened fire repeatedly on protesters in yemen's southern city of taiz on saturday, wounding 35 people, a doctor said, and a gulf envoy arrived to try to revive a plan to end the crisis.
